member.name: T:EnumUtilities.EnumCompiledCache`1
member.summary:
Uses Linq Expressions to compile Enum functions
(c) Alexandre Rogozine 2016

member.name: T:EnumUtilities.EnumUtil
member.summary:
Enum Utilities.
Provides type safe Enum extension methods by "bypassing" .NET restrictions.

summary.para: Provides all the functions of EnumUtil, but requires two constrains - first must be System.Enum and second a specific enumeration type
Do not use this class directly if possible; Go through EnumUtil instead.

member.name: T:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1
member.summary: Unsafe Version. Use only when necessary.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.GetUnderlyingType``1
member.summary: Returns the underlying type of the specified enumeration. Wrapper for
member.typeparam: The enumeration whose underlying type will be retrieved.
member.returns: The underlying type of T.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.GetName``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns the Name of a certain Enum Value. Wrapper for
member.returns: Name of the enum value

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.Parse``1(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object. Wrapper for
member.param: A string containing the name or value to convert.
member.returns: An object of type T whose value is represented by value.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.Parse``1(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object. A parameter specifies whether the operation is case-insensitive. Wrapper for
member.param: A string containing the name or value to convert.
true to ignore case; false to regard case.
member.returns: An object of type T whose value is represented by value.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.GetValues``1
member.summary: Retrieves an array of the values of the constants in a specified enumeration. Wrapper for
member.returns: An array that contains the values of the constants in T.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.GetNames``1
member.summary: Retrieves an array of the names of the constants in a specified enumeration. Wrapper for
member.returns: A string array of the names of the constants in T.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.TryParse``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object. Wrapper for
member.typeparam: The enumeration type to which to convert value.
member.param: The string representation of the enumeration name or underlying value to convert.
Contains an object of type T whose value is represented by value if the parse operation succeeds
member.returns: true if the value parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.TryParse``1(System.String,System.Boolean,``0@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of the name or numeric value of one or more enumerated constants to an equivalent enumerated object. A parameter specifies whether the operation is case-sensitive. The return value indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
member.typeparam: The enumeration type to which to convert value.
member.param: The string representation of the enumeration name or underlying value to convert.
true to ignore case; false to consider case.
Contains an object of type T whose value is represented by value if the parse operation succeeds
member.returns: true if the value parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Bitwise OR

member.summary: Bitwise AND

member.summary: Bitwise Exclusive OR

member.summary: Bitwise NOT

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.HasFlag``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Checks whether a flag exists. This function does not check for FlagsAttribute.
member.returns: true if the bit field or bit fields that are set in flag are also set in the current instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.SetFlag``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Returns the result of bitwise or between the passed in value and flag.
member.returns: Value with the specified flag set

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.UnsetFlag``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Returns the result of bitwise and for value and bitwise not of the flag.
member.returns: Value with the specified flag unset

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.ToggleFlag``1(``0,``0)
member.summary: Returns the result of bitwise exclusive or for the value and the flag.
member.returns: Value with the specified flag toggled

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.ToggleFlag``1(``0,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets or Unsets a specified flag.
member.param: true to set and false to unset
member.returns: Value with the specified flag toggled

member.name: M:EnumUtilities.EnumUtilUnsafe`1.IsDefined``1(``0)
member.summary: Checks if the value is valid for the enum.
member.returns: true if is valid for .

remarks.para: For the sake of providing a typesafe API alternative to Enum.IsDefined(typeof(T), value).

member.summary: Converts the value of the specified enumeration to a byte.
